about_the_game:
Enriching Experiences of Pixel Art School Adventure Game

★Main Story

This is the story of the heroine, Green, one day during her student days.
Entrusted by her school club sister, Green set out to find new members to join, and immediately spotted her target after heading out the door.
It may sound lucky, but it turned out not to be.
Without realising it, all sorts of trouble began to find its way to her...

★Game System

In addition to the main story, you can also experience colorful substories, dress-up, cooking, puzzle solving, and other kinds of elements in this game.
You can also hold off on the main storyline and explore the school freely.
What's more, the addition of "Reputation" will allow for a variety of story developments.

The maximum value of "Reputation" is 99 and the minimum is 0.It is divided into three sections in 33 steps.
Some events and character interactions are affected by Green's "Reputation".
And at the same time, Green's practices and choices may change its value.
For example, helping others causes it to go up; an unwanted favor causes it to go down.

But things are unpredictable and that it takes time for things to develop.
Something may start out as a good thing, but after a period of development where Green can't see it has a bad outcome instead.
Sometimes the opposite may also happen.
Therefore changes in “Reputation” re not necessarily instant feedback.(But in turn perhaps this could be exploited ...?)

★Main Characters

● Green: the heroine of the game

Who was famous at school for being a troublemaker.
Enthusiastic and lively, always makes things happen.
Despite being a member of the astronomy club, her interest is drama.
With a dream of having perfect acting skills, she "works" on it every day.

●Ryuu：Green's senior club sister

Cold and venomous-tongued.
Out of sympathy for her, Ryuu let Green join the astronomy club while all the other clubs rejected her, and was busy cleaning up her mess every day.
That day seemed to coincide with Ryuu's birthday.

●Jimmy: a member of the drama club

One of Green's friends, a normal guy.
Dreaming to become an actor, he has been honing his acting skills and aims to get into a relevant university.
That day for the new version of "Salesman Park Busy Now" written by the drama club leader, he always felt that something was wrong and got caught up in thoughts.
Who exactly is the murderer ......?

●Fujimine: costume designer for the drama club

One of Green's friends, specialising in tailoring and needlecraft.
Easy-going, but sometimes deliberately cute and adorable.
She makes a lot of clothes for Green, so go see her if you want to get dressed up.

★Relationship with MWLC

This is an anecdote game for the MWLC, with the plot taking place after the MWLC timeline.
But even if you haven't played the MWLC it doesn't affect the experience at all.
